search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for IXACT Contact CRM (ixact-contact-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for IXACT Contact CRM can be found at: [https://www.ixactcontact.com/pricing/](https://www.ixactcontact.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
The Most Cost-Effective Way To Get More Clients and Referrals
-------------------------------------------------------------

### Start now in 3 easy steps:

**Step 2: Get instant access to the CRM.** If you want help uploading your contacts and calendar data, our **support team** will help you get up and running.

**Step 3: Get automated call reminders, and send automated monthly e-Newsletters, drip email campaigns, and social media posts** to stay top of mind and turn leads into clients.

[##### Start Free Trial No contract. Cancel anytime.](https://www.ixactcontact.com/sales-redirect.php)

### Rave Customer Reviews

“IXACT Contact has helped us **increase our business by over 100%!**“

Keith Roy, RE/MAX Select Realty

“With IXACT Contact, I’m **communicating to my clients better and getting more business**. I’m making between $50k and $75k more a year.”

Scott Cooper, Keller Williams Experience Realty

“IXACT Contact has helped me **double my business** this year. The system is simply amazing!”

Dennis Paradis, RE/MAX Hallmark

### Pricing Summary

#### IXACT Contact's Integrated CRM and Email Marketing Solution Includes:

Robust CRM

Powerful Email Marketing

Automated Monthly e-Newsletter

Responsive Agent Websites

Mobile App and Google Sync

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/)

#### CRM - Key Features:

Detailed Contact Profiles, History, and Social Intelligence

Calendar & Task List with Automated Reminders

Reminders for Keep in Touch Calls, Birthdays, and more

Active Business Area for Managing Listings and Buyers

Automated Lead Capture and Nurturing

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/real-estate-crm/)

#### Email Marketing - Key Features:

Professionally Written & Designed e-Newsletter

Video Email via BombBomb

Targeted Lead Nurture Drip Email Campaigns

Marketing Templates including Holiday and Event e-Cards

Advanced Email Campaign Reporting showing Opens and Clicks

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/real-estate-email-marketing/)

#### Agent Websites – Key Features:

Fully Responsive Websites that Automatically Adjust to All Devices

Customizable Themes with Mobile-Optimized Image Library

Professionally Written Content: 16 Web Pages + Bi Weekly Blog

Optional Listings Integration (IDX) – SEO Optimized

Powerful Lead Generation and Lead Capture Capabilities

Full Social Media Integration including Facebook App

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/real-estate-agent-websites/)

#### Teams Version

Team Leader

$46.75/month

$55/month

Team Members

$28.90/month

$34/month

IXACT Contact has a real estate CRM solution that works effectively for all real estate teams of all sizes.

Billed Annually  
You Save 15%

Billed Monthly  
\* Save 15% with Annual Plan

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/crm-for-real-estate-teams/)

#### Broker Program

IXACT Contact’s Broker Program makes it easy to provide all your agents with a highly branded and customized version of IXACT Contact’s world-class CRM solution.

Implementation is quick and easy, and Broker Program pricing is at a level that ANY brokerage can afford.

Call to discuss  
1.866.665.0018

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/broker-program/)

#### OPTIONAL Agent Website Add-Ons

IDX Broker® Core

$50/month

Website Domain Registration

$24/year

One time setup fee for IDX\*

$69

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/idx-options-comparison-table/)

#### OPTIONAL Social Stream

Social Stream is an add-on to IXACT Contact that completely automates the process of finding and streaming high-quality content to your social media sites, enabling you to reap the benefits of a more active, engaging social media presence – without any work on your part…It’s all done for you!

$20/month

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/real-estate-social-media-content-social-stream/)

#### OPTIONAL Mass Email Purchases

IXACT Contact gives you 2,500 FREE mass emails every month! However, there’s NO LIMIT on the number of emails that you can send each month, or the size of the distribution list for any single mass email.

Should you need more than the 2,500 FREE mass emails in any given month, you can bulk purchase additional mass emails that never expire and can be used as needed. Bulk purchase pricing options are the following:

1,000 Emails

$10

2,500 Emails

$20

5,000 Emails

$30

10,000 Emails

$50

25,000 Emails

$100

50,000 Emails

$150

Note: Drip emails sent by IXACT Contact Marketing Plans do not count as mass emails and are unlimited.

Learn More

#### OPTIONAL Text Marketing

To take advantage of the Text Marketing features in IXACT Contact, you need to purchase a custom texting phone number. Your custom number includes 100 texting credits per month at no additional charge.

Should you need more than 100 texting credits in any given month, you can bulk purchase additional credits that never expire and can be used as needed. Bulk purchase pricing options are as follows:

$5/month

500 Credits

$15

1,000 Credits

$25

2,500 Credits

$55

5,000 Credits

$100

10,000 Credits

$175

\*Outbound messages require 1 credit per 160 character segment. Outbound messages that include a picture require 2 additional credits. Inbound messages require 2 credits per 160 character segment.

Note: Lead capture notification text messages do not require the purchase of a custom texting phone number, and are free and unlimited.

Learn More

#### IXACT Recruiter™

IXACT Recruiter is an agent recruiting CRM and marketing system that makes it easy to stay in touch and build relationships with your recruiting prospects.

It includes all the features you’d expect in a leading real estate recruiting system from advanced contact management to powerful email marketing, including a done-for-you monthly e-Newsletter.

Individuals and Team Leader

$85/month

$99/month

Team Members

$38/month

Billed Annually

You Save 15%

$45/month

Billed Monthly

\* Save 15% with Annual Plan

[Learn More](https://ixactcontact.com/agent-recruiting-crm/)

Review our real estate CRM software pricing summary, or contact us to start your free 14-day trial period today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes subscription plans for individuals, teams, and brokers, with optional add-ons for websites, social media, and mass email/text marketing.

pricing_tiers.tier_name: IXACT Recruiter - Individuals and Team Leader
pricing_tiers.tier_description: Agent recruiting CRM for individuals and team leaders.
Agent recruiting CRM for team members.

additional_fees.fee_description: Monthly fee for IDX Broker Core integration.
One-time setup fee for IDX integration.
